backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister handling access control, user approval, open-access mode, and defining business types like products, contacts, estimates, and inventory.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose and styling behavior of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and layout defaults for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, PWA assets, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest detailing app metadata, theming, icons, and installation behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and offline fallbacks for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that initializes identity, always renders the dashboard, and conditionally shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple UI component showing an access-denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminBackupModul: Provides admin-only UI for exporting and importing backups with file parsing, validation, and dialog confirmations.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordMod: Empty placeholder file for an admin password modal component.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application layout wrapper managing header, footer, navigation, and mobile drawer around module content.
frontend/src/components/BillingModule.ts: Full billing UI handling estimates, contacts, branding, printing, payments, and Bluetooth printer integration.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothPrinter: Dialog displaying Bluetooth printer requirements and generating a printable reference page.
frontend/src/components/ChangePasswordMo: Empty placeholder file for a change-password modal component.
frontend/src/components/ContactsModule.t: Manages creation, editing, deletion, and display of contacts with filtering and pending amount calculations.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard showing product, stock, and contact statistics with summary cards and basic analytics.
frontend/src/components/EstimatePrintVie: Renders a print dialog for estimates with standard and thermal print modes, supporting browser and Bluetooth printing. Manages preview settings, printer connections, and dynamic content generation.
frontend/src/components/FinanceModule.ts: Displays finance dashboards and reports including profit/loss, inventory, purchases, sales, and transactions. Supports filtering, data fetching, and printing formatted report views.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing branding, a link to caffeine.ai, and the current version number.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, user profile menu, role badges, and logout handling. Integrates authentication and responsive mobile menu support.
Manages product inventory with search, sorting, and stock update dialogs. Fetches product data, checks admin permissions, and updates stock quantities.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePrintView: Empty placeholder file intended for future invoice printing functionality.
Mobile navigation drawer rendering sidebar navigation and handling module changes. Uses sheet layout with optional admin controls.
frontend/src/components/MobileNumberModa: Empty placeholder file for a future mobile number modal component.
frontend/src/components/ModulePageHeader: Reusable header component for module pages providing icon, title, subtitle, and optional action buttons.
frontend/src/components/PriceOverrideDia: Displays a dialog requiring admin approval when selling below cost, showing pricing details and profit/loss calculation.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNavigatio: Renders top or sidebar navigation with module buttons, filtering admin-only items based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProductAutocompl: Provides a searchable popover to select products, filtering by name or category and returning the chosen product.
frontend/src/components/ProductsModule.t: Manages product listing, creation, editing, and deletion using dialogs and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile via a modal form.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModule.t: Handles purchasing workflow including product selection, line items, override checks, and CRUD operations for purchases.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Displays an install prompt for the PWA using the beforeinstallprompt event. Handles dismiss logic, install flow, and prevents repeated prompts.
frontend/src/components/SortControls.tsx: UI controls for selecting a sort field and toggling ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBluetoothThermalPr: Provides a React hook to connect to, manage, and send print data to Bluetooth thermal printers using Web Bluetooth.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, identity persistence, and login state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors to fetch and mutate user, product, contact, backup, and financial data.
frontend/src/hooks/useThermalQuickPrevie: Stores and manages thermal preview settings with localStorage persistence and reset capability.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode themes, and component overlay styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the application.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for an admin login screen.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard shell and switches between modules based on user role and selected view.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login UI with Internet Identity authentication and feature overview cards.
frontend/src/types/web-bluetooth.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for the Web Bluetooth API, adding missing device, GATT server, service, and characteristic types.
frontend/src/utils/sort.ts: Provides generic string, number, bigint, and date comparison helpers and a utility to sort filtered items.
frontend/src/utils/thermalQuickPreview.t: Declares thermal preview settings and utilities to generate CSS for on-screen and print previews of receipts.
frontend/src/utils/thermalReceiptEncodin: Implements ESC/POS command generation to encode receipt data into printer-ready byte sequences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, border radii, animations, and enabling plugins for animation and typography.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s architecture, features, and known issues for the ERP system.
